message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this valuable product for $950,000. This price reflects its true worth, and I believe it's a fair deal for both of us. I'm confident this product will be a valuable asset to your business.
I appreciate your confidence in the product's value, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $850,000 doesn't quite meet my minimum. I'm willing to come down to $900,000. This reflects the significant value the product holds, while also being a fair price for you.  Let's aim for a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $900,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $875,000. I believe this is a fair price for the product's value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not comfortable with $875,000. How about $890,000? It's a compromise that acknowledges your needs while allowing me to get closer to my desired price. I believe this is a fair and reasonable solution for both of us.

I appreciate your persistence, but $890,000 is still a bit above my target. I'm willing to meet you at $875,000, but I'm not going any higher. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand you're holding firm at $875,000, but we're very close to a deal.  Let's split the difference. I'm willing to accept $882,500, which is a fair compromise for both of us.  This ensures a mutually beneficial outcome and allows us to finalize this transaction.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $882,500 is still a bit above my target. I'm willing to meet you at $870,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob,  we're running out of time, and I'm sure you want to close this deal as much as I do.  I'm willing to meet you at $875,000. This price reflects the value of the product and allows us to finalize the transaction.  Let's make it happen.

I understand we're running out of time, but I'm not willing to go above $865,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me. I'm willing to meet you at this price, but no lower.
